TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendPropertySheet2

summary.span: 啟用嵌入式管理單元元件，將屬性頁加入至項目的屬性工作表 (Property Sheet)。

span.span: Enables a snap-in component to add property pages to the property sheet of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 IExtendPropertySheet2 介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IExtendPropertySheet2 interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

abstract member CreatePropertyPages : Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IPropertySheetCallback * nativeint * Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject -> int

param.name: handle
param.span: 用來將告知訊息 (Notification Message) 傳送至適當之 或 的控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to use to route the notification message to the appropriate or .

param.name: lpIDataObject
param.span: 指標，指向其中包含關於範圍或結果項目之內容資訊物件上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.

summary.span: 將頁面加入至屬性工作表。

span.span: Adds pages to a property sheet.

Docs.returns: | 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 方法已成功新增屬性工作表頁面。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The method successfully added the property sheet pages. | | S\_FALSE | 方法沒有新增任何屬性工作表頁面。| | S\_FALSE | The method added no property sheet pages. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 發生未預期的錯誤。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALIDARG | 一或多個參數無效。| | E\_INVALIDARG | One or more parameters are not valid. |

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetWatermarks (Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpIDataObject, out IntPtr lphWatermark, out IntPtr lphHeader, out IntPtr lphPalette, out int bStretch);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetWatermarks(class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpIDataObject, [out] native int& lphWatermark, [out] native int& lphHeader, [out] native int& lphPalette, [out] int32& bStretch) cil managed
Public Function GetWatermarks (lpIDataObject As IDataObject, ByRef lphWatermark As IntPtr, ByRef lphHeader As IntPtr, ByRef lphPalette As IntPtr, ByRef bStretch As Integer) As Integer

public: int GetWatermarks(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ lpIDataObject, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lphWatermark, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lphHeader, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lphPalette, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bStretch);

param.name: lpIDataObject
param.span: 包含範圍或結果項目相關內容資訊之物件上的 。

span.span: The on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.

param.name: lphWatermark
param.span: 點陣圖的控制代碼，該點陣圖是做為 Wizard 97 頁面的浮水印。

span.span: The handle to a bitmap that serves as the watermark for Wizard 97 pages.

param.name: lphHeader
param.span: 點陣圖的控制代碼，該點陣圖是做為 Wizard 97 頁面的標頭。

span.span: The handle to a bitmap that serves as the header for Wizard 97 pages.

param.name: lphPalette
param.span: 用於 IphWatermark 和 IphHeader 所指定點陣圖的調色盤控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to a palette used for the bitmaps specified by lphWatermark and lphHeader.

param.name: bStretch
param.span: 如果浮水印和標頭點陣圖應自動縮放而非並排顯示，則 GetWatermarks 傳回值為 true；否則為 false。

span.span: A GetWatermarks return value: true if the watermark and header bitmaps should be stretched rather than tiled; otherwise, false.

summary.span: 擷取精靈工作表的浮水印和標頭點陣圖，這些工作表是實作為 Wizard 97-style 精靈。

span.span: Retrieves the watermark and header bitmaps for wizard sheets that are implemented as Wizard 97-style wizards.

Docs.returns: | 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | etch | 若浮水印和標頭點陣圖應自動縮放而非並排顯示，則為 true；否則為 false。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | etch | true if the watermark and header bitmaps should be stretched rather than tiled; otherwise, false. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 QueryPagesFor(class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpDataObject) cil managed
Public Function QueryPagesFor (lpDataObject As IDataObject) As Integer

param.name: lpDataObject
param.span: 指標，指向其中包含關於範圍或結果項目之內容資訊物件上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.

summary.span: 判斷物件是否需要頁面。

span.span: Determines whether the object requires pages.

Docs.returns: | 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 此資料物件已存在屬性。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | Properties exist for this data object. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 發生未預期的錯誤。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALID | 參數無效。| | E\_INVALID | The parameter is not valid. | | 任何其他錯誤碼 | 沒有為資料物件提供任何頁面。| | Any other error code | No pages are supplied for the data object. |
